summary.para: A pixel-shader interface manages an executable program (a pixel shader) that controls the pixel-shader stage.

remarks.para: The pixel-shader interface has no methods; use HLSL to implement your shader functionality. All shaders in are implemented from a common set of features referred to as the common-shader core..
